ModMetaData.name: Caravan Mood Buff
ModMetaData.author: Syrus
ModMetaData.description:
Adds mood buffs for caravans: - while traveling in a caravan - while on a map that is not player controlled, like event sites or battles - when a carvan site that is being visited has no more enemies - when winning a caravan battle All buffs are adjustable in the settings.
Using this, caravans should be a bit less painful when it comes to constant mood breaks.
